summary: Schedule API fails when creating a schedule with a cron expression due to a Protobuf Timestamp type mismatch. The error occurs in the ScheduleSpec when adding a cron string.
userImpact: Users cannot create scheduled workflows using the Schedule API, blocking a core feature.
rootCause: Type mismatch in Protobuf Timestamp handling when processing cron schedule specifications.
keyQuote: Given value is not an instance of Google\Protobuf\Timestamp
